thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Troy Adams
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Troy Adams

author: Troy Adams
title: Troy Adams
text: Ordered a small drone. Unit was delivered with a broken remote control (cracked screen). They kept insisting on a video to see if there was a "fix". Then they said they to ship it back at my expense and they would review. I order a LOT of stuff online, including from China. This is one of the worst experiences I have ever had. I would NOT recommend.
